lom:description.lom:string:
Part of the Sally Ride Science website. This site features videos of Educator Astronaut Barbara Morgan on board the STS-118. "Teachers inspire wonder, broaden our horizons and encourage our dreams. They open doors to discovery and exploration.
We invite you to join in on our celebration of teachers. We're honored to acknowledge Educator Astronaut Barbara Morgan for her accomplishments on STS-118, and for being an excellent representative of all teachers."

lom:title.lom:string: Sally Ride's Celebrating Teachers - Barbara Morgan's STS-118 Journey
